text:
League 1
N√Æmes - Rennes: which channel at what time?
N√Æmes hosts the Stade Rennais on behalf of the 12th day, this Saturday, November 2, 2019. A meeting broadcast live on television. On which channel and at what time? Answer in this article.
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Rafael Da Silva



This Saturday, the Nimes of Bernard Blaquart receive the Stade Rennais Julien Stephan. Currently 18th, Nimes remains on three consecutive draws in Ligue 1, against LOSC (2-2), Amiens (1-1) and more recently the Stade de Reims (0-0). A victory against the Rennes will be mandatory to get out of the red zone. They remain on a nice win against Toulouse on the score of 3-2, thanks to a goal from his young striker Yann Gboho in extra time. 10th, the Stade Rennais can return to 5th place in case of victory.




N√Æmes-Rennes on television




Roman Philippoteaux, one of the main weapons of N√Æmes + 21 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between N√Æmes and Stade Rennais is to follow live on French television this Saturday, November 2, 2019, from 20:00 on BeIn Sports 1 (multiplex) and 7.
